library(raster)
# read data

  unique(modzcta_1)

  mutate(modzcta_1 = as.numeric(modzcta)) %>% 
  unique(modzcta_1)

map_df <- merge(map, project_df, by = 'modzcta_1', duplicateGeoms = TRUE)
